definitions.definition: A weight sufficient to balance another, for example in the opposite end of scales ; an equal weight.
An effect of equal power or force acting in opposition ; a force sufficient to balance another force or influence
The relation of two weights or forces which balance each other; equilibrium

main_definition: A weight sufficient to balance another, for example in the opposite end of scales ; an equal weight.
secondary_definitions: An effect of equal power or force acting in opposition ; a force sufficient to balance another force or influence
The relation of two weights or forces which balance each other; equilibrium
